website_summaries.verdict: This easy-to-assemble hutch has almost everything your rabbit could want - plenty of space, a run and nesting box. You may, however, need to modify it if you want a mesh bottom for waste.
pros: Spacious multi level hutch with asphalt roof
Three sliding trays for easy cleanup
Made from cypress wood and powder coated metal mesh
cons: No place for waste to drop

customer_reviews.title: Overall it's good
customer_reviews.text: I bought hutch #4. Overall it seems like a good hutch. The screw holes on the roof were hard to find and I ended up having to drill my own. Would like it if the bottom also had wire instead of the rabbit sitting directly on metal pan. I am going to modify the hutch to add that. This way I can slide out the tray without bunny trying to escape.
customer_reviews.author: BeeGirl

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the hutch #4 and my bunny absolutely loves it! Very spacious and easy to clean. The only thing I would note is that it had a heavy odor when first put together. I would wait a day or 2 before putting your furry friend inside. Other than that, it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cwish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect indoor hutch for our bunnies that gives them room to run
customer_reviews.text: Great hutch. We use it indoors and I was able to put it together without my husband. A few things I did not like was the roof shingles have loose pieces that fall all over when you are unwrapping the product. My bunnies love to chew on the wood on the inside, so I am hoping it does last a while. The stairs are my bunnies favorite part. In the morning they do laps together up and down.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Very BIG!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased when I put this together and realized how HUGE it really was. It gave our bunny lots of space to roam around which made her very happy. It was quite easy to assemble and the directions were very clear. The only problem was that the part on the roof was broken. It was only for looks so it didn't matter very much but it was still important. We reached out to the company who said they would handle it, but we never heard back from them, leaving us with a broken part of our purchase. I am very happy with the product but not with the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Great for rabbits! Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Went together easy enough! Accomodates our bonded trio of rabbits very well, inclusing a Flemish Giant, however they have access to a play area in addition to the run attached to the hutch. The wood is a little lightweight and soft, but it seems to be a quality hutch. Does have room for their litter boxes so I just put them in the playpen. The tray walls are not very high so litter flies everywhere, if your bunny 'goes' in the corner prepare for spillage. Otherwise very nice! Will order another!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great bunny hutch!
customer_reviews.text: We love this hutch for our 2 bunnies!! I was so impressed how easy it was to assemble. My only complaint is sometimes it’s hard to pull out all the pee and poop filled bedding bc the slots are so small to pull out the trays. But other wise easy to clean and change and looks great in our backyard and bunnies have plenty of room to move around.
customer_reviews.author: SMK

customer_reviews.title: Irritated
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build, but was shorter then it said by almost 5 inches and almost three inches narrow then it said, and two inches shorter then it was suppose to be. May not seem like much, but it is if your a guinea pig owner
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Mgrdichian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bunny mansion!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great purchase for our bunny. He really loves his house. All the pieces were here and in good condition. Also, it was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Q.

customer_reviews.title: Great option for our holland lop!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old and I had it out together in less than an hour. Super easy. Our bunny seems to love it so far. I do wish it had wire above the trays like our old one just for making clean up easier... our bunny tries to get out under the front when the tray is out. Also the trays are a little tough to remove but I’m sure that will loosen up as it is taken out more. We are using it indoors currently. I had hoped it would be big enough for more than one bunny but it’s definitely not.
customer_reviews.author: Raechel Parsley

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: The bunnies really like their new home. They kick some of their bedding out through the wire, but that was easily fixed by adding some strips of rubber (think wall kick).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Bun Mansion
customer_reviews.text: Assembled this by myself with no problem, have had our rabbit living in it indoors since the spring. She has a penned area attached so she can run around & we moved the litter box out of the cage part because urine was getting on the wood which is no good and was a pain to clean! But everything is holding up great. So, as long as you take steps to prevent your bunny from peeing on the wood of this cage, it should last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Complicated to build. Only had it up for 2 weeks and the ramp is already coming off the hinges. Seems big, but when buns are in it, I realize how little room their is to roam around.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Hutch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little hutch. It went together rather easy. I have two lion heads maybe 4 lbs each and they fit fine. I am a little concerned about the exposed wood inside the hutch but I have put chew toys in there.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin B.

customer_reviews.title: My chicken can finally have a home
customer_reviews.text: My chicken can finally have a home. I used this for chicken and not the rabbit. It fits well and they all squish in, althought it is little tight. This thing has the roof preventing the rain from soaking through. it has 3 easy access entry doors for the chicken to go in at night.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Needs better design
customer_reviews.text: This rabbit cage is so cute , however they did not put thought into the design for when the Rabbit urinates and poops ,It’s a solid base with metal so the feet and bottom of animals stay wet and walk in their own mess which get animals sick so not very hygienic . Means a lot of cleaning . Maybe it’s good for an inside cage but for outside needs a mesh bottom for filth to fall through and Rabbits to stay dry . Please think about a mesh panel above the solid bottom. Also the metal panel will rot quickly due to staying wet .
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Chin

customer_reviews.title: Love the house!
customer_reviews.text: We love this bunny house! It took my granddaughter about an hour to put it together. I held some pieces for her but she did all the rest of the work. The only issue we have with the product is that the pieces were not painted carefully. The stained parts are great but we are having to paint all the white pieces they needed and extra hand of paint. Our rabbit will be an indoor pet so we want the house to be pretty and comfortable. Can’t wait for the resident to arrive. 🐰
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Fuertes

customer_reviews.title: hutch legs very short and no easy way to reach in to pet rabbits
customer_reviews.text: This hutch is VERY low to the ground which requires lots of squatting by owner. If you remove top tray rabbits come up ramp and fall through to lower tray. I prefer wire over the trays so poop/pee can fall through and rabbits don't sit in it. Gross. A hinged roof would have made lifting rabbits out much easier. We take our rabbits out daily to a pen in the yard for exercise. This hutch is so nice looking... but needs some tweaks to be a really good functioning hutch.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Hurt

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Wood falling apart easily. Stairs fell off after cleaning cage twice. Had to re drill hold and glue back onto second story.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Malone

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bunny Hutch for Our Two Buns
customer_reviews.text: This hutch is awesome! It was surprisingly easy to put together, my husband and I did it in less than an hour. The only thing that might cause an issue is that the lip of the tray gets caught on the ramp so I have to lift the ramp some to pull it out. We're using it inside, I'm hoping our two buns don't chew it too much, but overall I'm so happy with this hutch!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hutch
customer_reviews.text: Strong odor for a few days. Asphalt was messy but otherwise a great hutch
customer_reviews.author: Lauren T.

customer_reviews.title: doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Looks really good at first and my rabbit seemed to enjoy all the space and different areas to rest/hide/play in. However, after less than a year of owning this the ramp to the second level ripped off simply from normal use. My rabbit is not a giant breed or overweight.
customer_reviews.author: dcblondie

customer_reviews.title: She has so much more room than the cage we had her in previously and she is definitely happier now! My only note would be too let ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to upgrade my bunny's cage and she absolutely loves it! She has so much more room than the cage we had her in previously and she is definitely happier now! My only note would be too let it air out in the backyard before bringing it inside if you plan on having it as an inside cage as it has a very strong scent when it first comes out of the box, its not a bad scent more like a wood scent but it was definitely a bit overpowering at first.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This should tell the whole story. My 13 year old girls put the hutch together in about 30 minutes with out my help. It sturdy and our rabbit love his new two story condo!!
customer_reviews.author: CJPINAJIAN

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very cute rabbit hutch.. plenty of room for her to stretch out and hop about. Not the sturdiest material, so we have kept her inside., but it makes cleaning up a breeze!! :)
customer_reviews.author: NeenerBabe

customer_reviews.title: Guinea pig paradise!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for two very spoiled piggies for them to enjoy our sunroom. Plenty of room. Trays are metal and easily slide out. Way to put together kids did it. Very nice find after months of searching leading pet sites and stores. Highly recommend would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: RV4RN

customer_reviews.title: Nice house
customer_reviews.text: Product came slightly damaged but not enough to return it. Assembly was easy and fast. Huge rabbit hutch great use of space. Our polish rabbit loves it. Ordered 2 by mistake and the company was very helpful
customer_reviews.author: KindleJason  Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hutch!
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for our 3 guinea pigs, we did have to re paint it because the paint jibe was absolutely horrible but other than that it’s a great hutch! Super hard to clean though and the hay will be all over your floor.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba M.

customer_reviews.title: Guinea Pig loves hit new home!
customer_reviews.text: It was a little confusing putting it together as some pieces were vague on how to put it together but the overall product is awesome and my daughter's guinea pig loves his new home :)
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne

customer_reviews.title: It won't hold up.
customer_reviews.text: I got this November 1st of last year. The tray that holds the litter has a huge hole in it. The urine ate though the metal. Which is impressive as from what I've read rabbit urine isn't horrible. And the cage was changed every two days with paper litter. Otherwise he likes it. He eats everything but he is a rabbit.
customer_reviews.author: Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Overall, I really like this hutch.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I really like this hutch. It is easy to assemble, if you have someone to help. My two baby Holland lops love it too. The trays can get stuck sometimes. I would recommend putting bedding on the trays.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a chinchilla cage. Super easy to clean, wood is safe. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Cockrell

customer_reviews.title: and it looks great all set up
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was fairly simple, and it looks great all set up. The bunny loves his new space!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Easy instruction manual
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little hutch for a bun. Was easy to follow instructions and assembled fairly quickly with little frustration between 2 adults with no power tools. Fits perfectly where I wanted it. All in all a solid product
customer_reviews.author: Steve somerlott

customer_reviews.title: Would totally recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and great size! I was extremely happy with this purchase and would have been extremely easy to assemble except one panel did not fit. It appeared to be a piece from a different hutch all together (but was the correct color). It wasn’t a huge deal we just had to cut it down to fit and drill new holes.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah M

customer_reviews.title: You need metal drawers!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been invaluable because all the floors are metal bottomed slide out drawers. And rabbits do often go in the wrong place, so you will need to empty and hose down.
customer_reviews.author: Bonny

customer_reviews.title: not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The hutch looks very nice, but it is not very sturdy. After just a few weeks of use the ladder to the upper hutch area fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Marleen

customer_reviews.title: good quality, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: i really like this, it’s good quality and a good size, but the inside flooring is a weird reflective material that seems like it gets too hot
customer_reviews.author: Joel M. Launchbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together!! Rabbit loves it and it looks nice. We did “air” it out before putting our bunny in it, not bad just being cautious. Nice quality and definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia N.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure that you have plenty of room 😂
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit loves its cage. And it smelled so good. Putting it together wasn't hard at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How to keep her from chewing on it is the question.
customer_reviews.text: Rabbit loves her new home. Easy to access trays for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is garbage
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and put it together, it is cheaply made the wood is already cracked. I don't feel this will last more than a year
customer_reviews.author: scott p.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: So cute and my guinea pigs love it! Easy enough to assemble and it’s pretty easy to clean as well!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Cute cute cute
customer_reviews.text: Perfect starter hutch for my granddaughter baby chicks The colors match the house
customer_reviews.author: Epona

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, beautiful product!
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to put together and my bunny loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Shy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and roomy.
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to clean. Wish it was built sturdier and legs higher and on rollers.
customer_reviews.author: DEBRA CHATTIN

customer_reviews.title: Bunny loves her new home!
customer_reviews.text: Seller delivered promptly and was very good to deal with...My bunny loves her new home...
customer_reviews.author: Lori J Kihm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered fast and was easy to put together and was good quality I would def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: PURLOVE Pet Rabbit Hutch Wooden Bunny Cage Small Animals House for Outdoor/Indoor Use
product_meta.description:
Color:Auburn+WhiteGive your furry friend the space they deserve with the Purlove Deluxe Rabbit Hutch Wooden Cottage crafted with small animals in mind. Designed to give your pet plenty of room to roam and explore, the first floor play area consists entirely of rabbit-safe powder coated wire mesh panels and Cypress Fir wood borders to create a well ventilated space to maintain clean air for your pet, while also allowing you a clear view to easily watch them go about their day uninterrupted. The second floor nesting box acts as a roomy insulated resting place for your pet to seek comfort and shelter when they need privacy, making them feel safe and relaxed while also shielding them from the elements, coupled with the weather-proof asphalt roof.
Easily access your rabbit or maintain your hutch using the 3 built-in easy access entry doors. Metal removable drop pan sliding floors eliminate the headache when cleaning your hutch. The sturdy interior ladder ramp connects both the base and upper level, allowing your pet to run up and down as they please.Perfect for both outdoor and indoor use, give your pet space to stretch their legs and roam comfortably in a large hutch designed with a tasteful build.

Features: 
Classic and spacious cottage-style design. 
Non-toxic paint finish.
Weather-proof asphalt roof.
3 built-in easy access entry doors with safeguard locks.
3 built-in removable bottom sliding tray for fast clean up.
Animal-safe powder coated wire mesh paneling. 
Connecting interior ladder ramp 
Dual roof design too keep your pet completely shaded.

Notice: 
Manual measurement has been used, there may be room for reasonable error 
Items may slightly differ from photo in terms of color due to the lighting during photo shooting or your monitor's display. 
Return Policy:http://www.amazon.com/sp?&seller=AG5L3JJZ30XAY&tab=policies
feature_bullets: Multi-level deluxe hutch for outdoor and indoor use.
Spacious Cottage-Style rabbit hutch finished in non-toxic auburn and white paint.
3 built-in metal sliding trays create easy fast clean-up.
3 easy-access entry doors for hassle-free access your pet and maintenance of the hutch.
Simple assembly with instructions and hardware included; Overall size: 62”L x 18”D x 36.8”H (including roof portion).

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
